name: Admin-console release 1.0
description:
We have released a new user account Admin Console!
LoginRadius User account will work as the center for :
a)LoginRadius site settings to be managed by Customer
b)Accessing Analytics, User Management and User Profile for Customer
c)managing all billing and account details for the customer
https://www.loginradius.com/updates/new-and-improved-loginradius-Admin-console

ADDED.text: Managed deployment settings, social login settings, user registration,SMTP settings and deployment settings
Ability to configure SSO settings in the Admin-console
Hosted Registration Options in Admin Console
Allow selecting custom fields in the Admin-console
Ability to configure Social Login widgets, Hybrid sharing widget and Friend invite widget
Ability to configure teams, account settings and billing settings
